name: CircleCrow school project
description:
Circle Crow is a minimal game created in the course Advanced Game Design & Development in Reykjavík University.

I was tasked to create a game in Unity using only a circle and a crow sound, nothing else was allowed. The only input allowed were: left mouse button, right mouse button, scroll wheel and scroll button.

Your objective is to find and reach the goal (green circle), when that happens something magical happens. Try not to fall out of the stage, if you collide with red walls you lose and the game restarts.

Controls:

Left Mouse button: Roll to the right.

Right mouse button: Flip gravity

Middle mouse button (scroll button): Reset the game

Press escape to exit the game.

I hope you enjoy!
